ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets the list of metadata entities.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Obtains details of a cached recommendation.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Obtains cached recommendations for a subscription. The recommendations are generated or computed by invoking generateRecommendations.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GenerateRecommendation
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Initiates the recommendation generation or computation process for a subscription. This operation is asynchronous. The generated recommendations are stored in a cache in the Advisor service.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetGenerateStatusRecommendation
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Retrieves the status of the recommendation computation or generation process. Invoke this API after calling the generation recommendation. The URI of this API is returned in the Location field of the response header.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Obtains the details of a suppression.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Enables the snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation. The snoozed or dismissed attribute is referred to as a suppression. Use this API to create or update the snoozed or dismissed status of a recommendation.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Enables the snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation. The snoozed or dismissed attribute is referred to as a suppression. Use this API to create or update the snoozed or dismissed status of a recommendation.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Enables the activation of a snoozed or dismissed recommendation. The snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation is referred to as a suppression.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetSuppressionContracts
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Retrieves the list of snoozed or dismissed suppressions for a subscription. The snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation is referred to as a suppression.
